SEARCH
Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerForView
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerForView
Controller class that implements the IControllerForView interface. This class acts as a bridge between the view and the data access layer, handling user and note operations.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • signup

      public User signup(String username, String password, javafx.scene.image.Image image, String languageCode)
      Signs up a new user with the provided details.
      Specified by:
      signup in interface IControllerForView
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.
      image - The profile picture of the new user.
      languageCode - The preferred language code of the new user.
      Returns:
      The created User object, or null if signup fails.

    • addNote

      public List<Note> addNote(String username, String title, String content, javafx.scene.image.Image image, LocalDateTime notificationTime)
      Adds a new note for a user.
      Specified by:
      addNote in interface IControllerForView
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      title - The title of the note.
      content - The content of the note.
      image - The image associated with the note.
      notificationTime - The notification time for the note.
      Returns:
      A list of the user's notes after adding the new note, or an empty list if the operation fails.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(String oldUsername, String newUsername, String password, javafx.scene.image.Image image, String languageCode)
      Updates a user's details.
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface IControllerForView
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - The current username of the user.
      newUsername - The new username of the user.
      password - The new password of the user.
      image - The new profile picture of the user.
      languageCode - The new preferred language code of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.
